t:
The amnesiac patient rubbed the lamp and begged the genie to grant his wish,
       “I want my memory back.”




                The genie was surprised,
           “I've never seen anyone ask
              for the same wish twice.”
c:
“It's odd. You asked me for your memory. Then you asked me to take it away. Now you're asking it back.”



#amnesia #genie #wish #memories #badmemories #samewish #surprise #twist
